message: Let's start fair. You get 10% and I get 90%. Let's see how this goes!
I understand you want the bigger cut, Alice, but that offer was too low. How about a 70/30 split in my favor? Think carefully, the money's worth less next round.
Okay, Bob. I'll concede to a 60/40 split in my favor. But be warned, this is my final offer.  If you reject this, things will only get worse for both of us.
Alice, you drive a hard bargain, but we both lose if this drags on. I'm offering 65/35.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
